bug.author: cupcakejunki3
bug.summary: failed transformation from new update how to fix ?
bug.description:
Transformation <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dreamnettech/dreampower/pull/1>#1</denchmark-link> failed The process has been interrupted by an unknown error, this may be caused by a corrupt installation, please check the console for more information. For more information please take a screenshot and report the following on Github or here: <denchmark-code> Error: usage: dreampower [-h] [-d] [-v] {run,checkpoints,gpu-info,daemon} ... </denchmark-code>
dreampower: error: argument mode: invalid choice: 'D:\Users\psych\AppData\Local\Programs\DreamTime\cli/624195e5-84cc-44f0-86a2-0b2cafb22a40.png' (choose from 'run', 'checkpoints', 'gpu-info', 'daemon') usage: dreampower [-h] [-d] [-v] {run,checkpoints,gpu-info,daemon} ... dreampower: error: argument mode: invalid choice: 'D:\Users\psych\AppData\Local\Programs\DreamTime\cli/624195e5-84cc-44f0-86a2-0b2cafb22a40.png' (choose from 'run', 'checkpoints', 'gpu-info', 'daemon')

comments.comment: DreamTime v1.1.0 and DreamPower v1.2.x are not compatible. Please wait for DreamTime v.1.2.x to become available.
